title: Just Another Manic Punday
content: In Ask Metafilter, Phanx is seeking cookbook joke titles that are puns on classic literature, "eg 'Loaf of Pi' or 'Bun day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich,'" while mermaidcafe would like ideas for "Southern Slothic fiction titles." Time to put your mighty lowest-form-of-humor skills to work, everyone!
author: taz
